JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Combat System Engineer – Shape the Future of Maritime Defence Technology
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Combat System Engineer – Shape the Future of Maritime Defence Technology

Are you ready to play a key role in cutting-edge defence technology?

At SH Defence, we are looking for a Combat System Engineer who thrives at the intersection of innovation and international collaboration. As part of SH Group, we develop and deliver advanced logistic solutions to the maritime defence sector. In this role, you will contribute to next-generation defence projects, ensuring seamless integration of modular combat & mission system.

Your Role

As a Combat System Engineer, you will be responsible for contributing to designing, integrating, and documenting combat and mission-critical systems. You will work closely with defence stakeholders, system suppliers, and internal teams to ensure our solutions meet operational requirements and technical specifications.

Key Responsibilities:
  • Ensure seamless system integration with CMS (Combat Management Systems) and IPMS (Integrated Platform Management Systems).
  • Develop technical specifications, requirement documentation, and system descriptions.
  • Collaborate with defence forces, system suppliers, and internal engineering teams.
  • Support system testing, validation, and qualification to meet defence standards.
Your Profile

We are looking for a candidate with a strong technical background and experience in defence or naval systems.

Qualifications & Experience:
  • Background from the armed forces (e.g., Weapons Technician, Weapon & Electronics Officer / -petty officer).
  • Degree in Engineering, preferably Systems Engineering or similar.
  • Experience with combat systems, naval weapons, electronics, and defence technology.
  • Knowledge of CMS, IPMS, C2 and integration of defence systems.
  • Proficiency in technical documentation, requirement specifications, and system descriptions.
  • Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to work across multidisciplinary teams.
  • Self-driven - setting the new standards for modular combat and mission systems.
  • Proficient in English (spoken and written); Danish is an advantage but not required.
  • Strong Communication skills to present system designs, technical specifications and -solutions to both internal and external stakeholders.
Why Join SH Defence?
  • Be part of an innovative company shaping the future of maritime defence technology.
  • Work with cutting-edge modular solutions for combat systems and advanced engineering solutions.
  • Engage in international projects and collaborate with leading defence forces.
  • Join a dynamic team with a strong focus on technical excellence and teamwork.
